programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.sub-title: Tiny House with Special Creature Comforts
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Building Outside the Lines
programme.desc: Cappie and Alex create the perfect oasis for a busy local family by turning a shipping container into a luxury swimming pool with underwater windows.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Enam kui 4000 aastat vanad Egiptuse puramiidid kuuluvad maailma kuulsaimate arhitektuurimalestiste hulka. Kuid keegi ei mõista taielikult, kuidas ja miks need ehitati. Kas me suudame dešifreerida Egiptuse hammastavate puramiidide tegelikku eesmarki?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Paljud naevad neid kaaluka tahisena Ameerika arengust. Ent mida iganes need ka tahistavad - Ameerika monumendid on kahtlemata muljet avaldavad oma hiiglaslike mõõtmete ja ulatuse, erakordsete inseneritoo saavutuste ja talletatud ajaloo poolest.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi saavad omale vaikese tooriistakomplekti. Barry jaab oksjonile hiljaks ja loob kampa uhe tagasihoidliku panustajaga. Mark Balelo lahkub oksjonilt suure printeriga, aga kas see toob talle ka suurt tulu?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barryle kukub Orangeis Californias kapp selga. Ivy Calvin sobrab prugis ja leiab nii mõndagi. Jarrod ja Brandi võidavad uhe lao, kuid kas nad ka teenivad selle pealt?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Saanud rohkem tõendeid, et aiatunnel, kus on tuvastatud kõrge kulla sisaldus vees, on seotud võimaliku tunnelite komplektiga Money Pitis, alustab meeskond rasket tood, et uks meeskonnaliige paaseks maa alla.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad manguasju ning Jarrod uritab maailmameistriga võistelda. Harrise vennad otsivad Hollywoodi kuulsuste alleel uht staari. Barry panustab turvaliselt.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Uustulnukad Rene ja Casey ostavad kuju, mis võib olla vaart tuhandeid dollareid. Darrell Sheets teeb kaslastega seotud avastusi ning Barry on tagasi koos kahe oksjoniingliga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Harrise vennad lahevad varjatud režiimile. Jarrod ja Brandi on heategevuslikul lainel. Barry leiab koti, mis viib ta suusatama. Darrell avastab suure posti.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui Ton ja Allen avastavad end oksjonil uksteise vastu pakkumisi tegemas, võitlevad endised partnerid vagevas vastasseisus, mis jatab pandimaja saatuse ja nende sõpruse kusimargi alla.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Parast purustavat luuasaamist lahkuvad poisid oksjonilt tuhjade katega ja otsivad õuemuugilt uut kaupa. Kuid kahtlased antiiksed tennisereketid ja iidne eriefektide kast ei pruugi neile sentigi teenida.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: UFO, mida margati maailma uhe puhama paiga kohal. Kas kuulsal fotol olev salaparane hõljuv "kosmosemees" võib olla aastakumneid kestnud keerukas pettus? Lisaks "uliinimesed", kes suudavad paljaste katega autosid peatada.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Aeg tiksub, kui muuja toob pandimajja Mr. T seinakella. Kas Rick ja Corey naevad kulda või haletsevad nad lolli? Chum ja Rick lahevad Texases fossiile otsima. Kuid kas nad suudavad tehingu valja kaevata või mattuvad tolmu alla?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Liituge ekspertide Giorgio Tsoukalose, William Henry ja Jason Martelliga, kes alustavad ulemaailmset uurimistood, vaadates ule sarja "Iidsed tulnukad" arhiivi, et uurida kõige saladuslikumaid arheoloogilisi paiku nagu Giza, Puma Punku ja teised.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Parast rasket oksjonit lahevad asjad veelgi hullemaks, kui poe omanik tahab poistega raakida. Ton uritab temaga labiraakimisi pidada, samal ajal kui Allen peab katsetama eksperimentaalset mootoriga langevarju, et paasta paevakasum.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui halastamatu poeomanik tahab takistada Toni ja Allenit uute esemete hankimisel Santa Barbaras, ajavad nad sõrad vastu. Mehed avastavad haruldase antiikse õhupussi ja vanaaegse puust paadi, mis on ehitatud kihutamiseks, kui see vaid ujub.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Paljud naevad neid kaaluka tahisena Ameerika arengust. Ent mida iganes need ka tahistavad - Ameerika monumendid on kahtlemata muljet avaldavad oma hiiglaslike mõõtmete ja ulatuse, erakordsete inseneritoo saavutuste ja talletatud ajaloo poolest.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui ruhm patte uritab Toni ja Allenit Hiinalinna oksjonilt valja suruda, võitlevad poisid vastu, mille tulemuseks on vagivaldne kokkupõrge ja nii haruldase Borneo puhkpussi kui ka eriefektide trossirakmete leidmine.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Saadaval on krossimootorratas ja haruldane karjapiits ning Ton ja Allen seisavad vastamisi uhe seni kõvema konkurendiga: nende endisel tootajal Carolynil, kes teab kõiki nende nippe, on raha põletada ja ta tahab kattemaksu.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen võitlevad paari tigeda naissoost oksjonikutiga, kes on vimma tais ja teevad pakkumisi pigem õeluse kui strateegia alusel. Ning Gatlingi relv ja soomusruu on palju vahem vaart, kui poisid ootasid.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Comptonisse, kus Jarrod saab endale uue huudnime ja leiab midagi, mida ta kunagi kogus. Mike ostab lao, mida Herb ei taha ja Barry uhineb oma vana sõbra Kennyga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry Weiss toob kohale ulemteenri. Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad vanaaegse lambi. Darrel Sheets maksab uhe lao eest kõige suurema summa, mida ta selles sarjas teinud on, aga kas see on seda vaart?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Homelandi, aga Harrise vennad oleksid pidanud koju jaama. Jarrod ja Brandi tegelevad ostmisega, pinged samas kasvavad. Rene ja Casey ostavad lao, aga saavad peagi aru, et on teinud vea.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kogu talletatud ajaloo jooksul on kulda kasutatud kõigeks alates ornamentidest kuni puhade esemete valmistamiseni. Kas on võimalik, et kullast valmistatud esemed evivad meie ule mingit võimu - akki sellist, mida me taielikult ei mõista?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui poodi saabub muuja "Energiasamba" mutsiga, mis on tehtud ansambli DEVO jaoks, siis kas Ricki pakkumine on parim? Ja hiljem koidab Ricki George Washingtoni allkirjastatud kiri. Kuid kas kusitav hind paneb ta massu algatama?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Saanud rohkem tõendeid, et aiatunnel, kus on tuvastatud kõrge kulla sisaldus vees, on seotud võimaliku tunnelite komplektiga Money Pitis, alustab meeskond rasket tood, et uks meeskonnaliige paaseks maa alla.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Tutvume maailma kumne salaparasema saarega, mille hulgas on kohad, kus vaidetavalt elavad hiiglased, osad saared aga kaovad õhku. Kas need uskumatud paigad võivad olla tõendid maavaliste kulaskaikude kohta?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Liituge ekspertide Giorgio Tsoukalose, William Henry ja Jason Martelliga, kes alustavad ulemaailmset uurimistood, vaadates ule sarja "Iidsed tulnukad" arhiivi, et uurida kõige saladuslikumaid arheoloogilisi paiku nagu Giza, Puma Punku ja teised.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Philadelphias seisavad poisid vastamisi siseinfot omava kahtlase pakkujaga ja endise NFL-i staari Vince Papaleiga võitluses vana jalgpallipassi ja koloniaalajastu musketi eest, mis võib olla vaart varandust... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Sõbralik võistlus endise tootaja Carolyniga muutub tigedaks võitluseks 1968. aasta Corvette Stingray eest, mis võimaldab Carolynile viimase naeru. Allen testib oma ninjaoskusi antiikse sirp-relvaga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kaks agedat vastast naitavad Tonile ja Allenile oksjonil koha katte, jattes duo "prugikasti" hatta ja neil on vaid vaike tõenaosus õhtuks tasa teha. Ja Ton saab sirakat.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas vaikese, inimesesarnase olendi jaanused võib olla tulnukast kulastaja surnukeha? Kas New Jersey piirkonda vaevavad valjud paugud parinevad hiiglastelt või jumalatelt? Ja mis on nende monoliitide taga, mis 2020. aastal ule kogu maailma ilmuvad?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick paneb sireenid huilgama, siirdudes otsima oma isiklikku tuletõrjeautot. Corey ja Rick reisivad aga ajas tagasi 1970ndatesse, jalitades kuulsalt ajakirjanikult Hunter S Thompsonilt parit erilist eset.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond on ullatunud, kui Gary avastab vana laevakai vahetus laheduses mitu eset ja koos madalama tunneli avastamisega Money Pitis võib Marty teooria eemalasuva kambri kohta lõpuks tõestust leida.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Enam kui 4000 aastat vanad Egiptuse puramiidid kuuluvad maailma kuulsaimate arhitektuurimalestiste hulka. Kuid keegi ei mõista taielikult, kuidas ja miks need ehitati. Kas me suudame dešifreerida Egiptuse hammastavate puramiidide tegelikku eesmarki?

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Kahes võistluses ning halastamatus testivoorus murtakse terasid ja valatakse pisaraid. Viimases voorus peavad kaks seppa tegema kolmeteralise Aafrika viskenoa kpinga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas uks piibli patriarh sai juhiseid 200 inglilt kõrgel maa kohal? Kas vanadele kreeklastele õpetas metalli tootlemist kalarahvas? Ja kas Egiptuse kõige vastuolulisem vaarao võis olla maavaline olend?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Optimism on suur, kui vennaskond naaseb Smiths Covei ja leiab tõendeid toode kohta, mis võivad lõpuks paljastada legendaarsed uleujutustunnelid ja viia nad otse Money Piti juurde.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Kogu inimajaloo jooksul on meie evolutsioonis toimunud ootamatuid ja dramaatilisi huppeid, mida lihtsalt ei saa seletada Darwini teooriaga. Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud pakuvad valja, et "puuduvaks luliks" on maavaline sekkumine.

programme.desc: Kui nende veoauto katki laheb, panevad Ton ja Allen kõik mangu, et koguda raha selle parandamiseks. Nad saavad lauajalgpalli, Tommy Guni trummid ja Toni rõõmuks terve laari Twinkiesi koogikesi, kuid kas sellest piisab?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Mehed võitlevad oma ageda endise tootajaga, samal ajal, kui hinnakergitaja ahvardab paeva ara rikkuda. Kui kõik lootus naib olevat kadunud, on monsterauto rehvide komplekt ja salaparane kast nende viimaseks võimaluseks võitjaks saada.

programme.desc: Kaks agedat vastast naitavad Tonile ja Allenile oksjonil koha katte, jattes duo "prugikasti" hatta ja neil on vaid vaike tõenaosus õhtuks tasa teha. Ja Ton saab sirakat.

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Tiitlikaitsja on võtnud maha kaks vastast, sealhulgas kahekordse sepikoja gladiaatori. Nuud on meie tšempion võtnud sihikule uue valjakutsuja ja uue relva, gladiaatori lemmiku - surmava sica.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ebatavalise kunstiteose, Rene ja Casey naudivad veini ning Barry raamatupidaja uritab teda tagasi hoida.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrel ja Ivy satuvad Ivy koduvaljakul vastamisi, Barry avastab rahustava efektiga kausid ning Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad DJ varustuse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ja Casey leiavad Placentias asju tais hoiukapi, Barry ostab lao, mis paneb ta kahtlema oma kohas oksjonimangus ning Darrell avastab hambaarsti varustuse.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tapvad metsad, kummitavad majad, maed, kust elusana alla ei tulda. Kas on olemas sellised asjad nagu "kurjad paigad", kus juhtub korduvalt seletamatult halbu asju?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Corey saab teada, kas jõud on temaga, kui muuja toob kaks Star Wars Lego minikujukest. Kas ta jõuab "C" abil tehinguni või tormab vastu telliskiviseina? Rick uritab põnevusest mitte lõhkeda, kui vaatab Jeff Koonsi õhupallikoera kuju.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond on ullatunud, kui Gary avastab vana laevakai vahetus laheduses mitu eset ja koos madalama tunneli avastamisega Money Pitis võib Marty teooria eemalasuva kambri kohta lõpuks tõestust leida.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Salaparase paritoluga hiiglaslikud megaliitehitised - kas Malta Vahemere saartel olevad iidsed musteeriumid võivad olla seotud kohalike legendidega tulnukate kulaskaikudest ja hiiglaslikest hubriidolenditest?

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja lahingud varvides
programme.desc: Natside armeel kulus vaid kuus nadalat, et vallutada Prantsusmaa tankide, lennukite ja Saksa vagede pealetungiga. Naete Blitzkriegi kampaania erakordset sõjalist edu haruldaste filmimaterjalide ja pealtnagijate kirjelduste kaudu.

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja lahingud varvides
programme.desc: 22. juunil 1941 kaivitas Saksamaa operatsiooni Barbarossa, mis oli metsik ja halastamatu runnak Nõukogude Liidu vastu. Nuud annavad asja varvitud filmid ja amatooride koduvideod enneolematu ulevaate sellest julmast konfliktist.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poepidamisega kaasnev surve mõjutab Toni ja Allenit ning isegi kaskadoori kukkumiskoti avastamine ei suuda pingeid leevendada. Kui asjad lahevad kuumaks, hulgab Ton partnerluse ja lahkub linnast.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kuna Ton on kadunud, on Allenil raskusi pandimaja pinnal hoidmisega, koolitades samal ajal Ellei oksjonil tootama. Parast agedat pakkumissõda Carolineiga ei pruugi sajandivanuse mootorratta tukkidest olukorra paastmiseks piisata.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen avastavad, et pandimaja omamine on palju keerulisem, kui nad eeldasid. Kuna arved kuhjuvad, ei pruugi isegi antiikmoona kollektsioonist ja mõnest klassikalisest jalgpallikiivrist piisata, et poisid saaksid end turvaliselt tunda.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas lumist põldu uletav kahejalgne kuju võib olla muinasjutuline lumeinimene? Kas taevas olev varvimuutev kera on jarjekordne naide Itaalias nahtud UFOde pikast ajaloost? Ja kas nurga tagant piiluv olend on tegelik kokkupuude tulnukaga?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kuni Rick uurib, mis peitub Funko Pop!-i ullatuskarbis, helistavad Corey ja Chumlee Rick Daleile, et paasta uht esimest tulekahju hairesusteemi. Kas Ricki varsked leiud osutuvad selle linna armuandideks või kaivitavad need hoopis hairekella?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Salaparase laeva logiraamatu avastamine annab taiendavaid tõendeid, mis viitavad, et 1746. aastal maabus Oak Islandil Prantsuse armaada, mida juhtis Duc DAnville. Money Pitis jõuab meeskond lahemale sellele, et meeskonnaliige saaks maa alla laskuda.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Tanapaeval usub rohkem inimesi kui kunagi varem, et UFOd on tulnukate paritolu. Kuid kui tulnukad on tulnud Maale valgusaastate kauguselt, kas nad võivad olla võimelised painutama nii aega kui ka ruumi?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy roovib Popsi ja viib ta Rosamondi, kus nad hangivad osavalt suureparase laoboksi. Kenny asub kõiki lõbustama ja tema naljatamine lõpeb tahtede nagemisega. Lisa tõestab, et tal on sõber... esialgu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.sub-title: Kui sul on see olemas, anna minna
programme.desc: Kenny satub tuttavale sõidukile ja jargneb sellele kuni Lancasteri oksjonini, kus ta puuab meeleheitlikult leida bensiiniraha. Rene uritab leida uut õnne parast kaotust Vegases.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Uus ostja paneb Barry ja Jarrodi proovile ning lahkub sealt pungil tais laoga. Barry leiab aga sõiduki ning Herb ja Mike satuvad peale gaasipumbale.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: MUFON on maailma juhtiv organisatsioon, mis tegeleb teaduslikult tundmatute õhunahtuste ja muude seletamatute kohtumiste uurimisega. Kas MUFONi ulatuslik andmebaas võib sisaldada kindlaid tõendeid maavaliste kulastuste kohta?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kogu maailmast on leitud palju saladuslikke esemeid, mis seavad kahtluse alla kõik, mida teame oma kaugete esivanemate tehnoloogiliste võimete kohta. Kui jatkame nende esemete uurimist, kas avastame siis inimliku leidlikkuse tõelise potentsiaali?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme suurimat dokumenteeritud katastroofi, mil võib olla seos teispoolsusega. Lendav koletis tuumaõnnetuses, meteoriit, mis havitas dinosaurused, ja surmav viirus, mis võis parineda teisest maailmast.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Asutajad Isad lõid USA vabaduse ja demokraatia alustalad. Sajandeid hiljem ilmnevad uued paljastused nende keerukuse, eesmarkide ja varjatud tõdede kohta. Millised saladused peituvad Ameerika kujundanud meeste taga?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tapvad metsad, kummitavad majad, maed, kust elusana alla ei tulda. Kas on olemas sellised asjad nagu "kurjad paigad", kus juhtub korduvalt seletamatult halbu asju?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Uus ostja paneb Barry ja Jarrodi proovile ning lahkub sealt pungil tais laoga. Barry leiab aga sõiduki ning Herb ja Mike satuvad peale gaasipumbale.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Salaparase laeva logiraamatu avastamine annab taiendavaid tõendeid, mis viitavad, et 1746. aastal maabus Oak Islandil Prantsuse armaada, mida juhtis Duc DAnville. Money Pitis jõuab meeskond lahemale sellele, et meeskonnaliige saaks maa alla laskuda.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ebatavalise kunstiteose, Rene ja Casey naudivad veini ning Barry raamatupidaja uritab teda tagasi hoida.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrel ja Ivy satuvad Ivy koduvaljakul vastamisi, Barry avastab rahustava efektiga kausid ning Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad DJ varustuse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ja Casey leiavad Placentias asju tais hoiukapi, Barry ostab lao, mis paneb ta kahtlema oma kohas oksjonimangus ning Darrell avastab hambaarsti varustuse.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui nende veoauto katki laheb, panevad Ton ja Allen kõik mangu, et koguda raha selle parandamiseks. Nad saavad lauajalgpalli, Tommy Guni trummid ja Toni rõõmuks terve laari Twinkiesi koogikesi, kuid kas sellest piisab?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Mehed võitlevad oma ageda endise tootajaga, samal ajal, kui hinnakergitaja ahvardab paeva ara rikkuda. Kui kõik lootus naib olevat kadunud, on monsterauto rehvide komplekt ja salaparane kast nende viimaseks võimaluseks võitjaks saada.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas lumist põldu uletav kahejalgne kuju võib olla muinasjutuline lumeinimene? Kas taevas olev varvimuutev kera on jarjekordne naide Itaalias nahtud UFOde pikast ajaloost? Ja kas nurga tagant piiluv olend on tegelik kokkupuude tulnukaga?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: MUFON on maailma juhtiv organisatsioon, mis tegeleb teaduslikult tundmatute õhunahtuste ja muude seletamatute kohtumiste uurimisega. Kas MUFONi ulatuslik andmebaas võib sisaldada kindlaid tõendeid maavaliste kulastuste kohta?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kogu maailmast on leitud palju saladuslikke esemeid, mis seavad kahtluse alla kõik, mida teame oma kaugete esivanemate tehnoloogiliste võimete kohta. Kui jatkame nende esemete uurimist, kas avastame siis inimliku leidlikkuse tõelise potentsiaali?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kuni Rick uurib, mis peitub Funko Pop!-i ullatuskarbis, helistavad Corey ja Chumlee Rick Daleile, et paasta uht esimest tulekahju hairesusteemi. Kas Ricki varsked leiud osutuvad selle linna armuandideks või kaivitavad need hoopis hairekella?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen seisavad silmitsi oma seni kõige raskema valjakutsega, kui kaks vana rivaali jõud uhendavad. Mehed kaevavad valja krossimootorratta ja paar võrgupussi, samal ajal kui tootajad põrkuvad Haff Ton Pawnis salaparaste ostjatega.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen laheb koos Elleiga oksjonile, samal ajal kui Ton ja Big Sis uuendavad poodi, et aidata rohkem kliente tuua. Allen avastab Ouija laua ja retrokorvpallide komplekti ning laheb kuulsa NBA-staariga võistlema.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: At the Battle of Isandlwana in 1879, Zulu warriors overwhelmed an occupying British army in what became Englands worst defeat at the hands of a colonial force. Join modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, to discover their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Greatest discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Lue Elizondo oli varasemalt tuvastanud UFO-de viis jalgitavat omadust, mida nimetatakse "viieks oluliseks omaduseks". Ent on ka kuues omadus, mida Elizondo uurima asus - nahtamatu oht, mida need õhusõidukid endast kujutada võivad.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas USA sõjavael võib tõesti salajane kosmoseprogramm olla? Kui nii, kas me valmistume siis kosmosesõjaks teiste riikide või koguni teiste liikide vastu?

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: At the Battle of Isandlwana in 1879, Zulu warriors overwhelmed an occupying British army in what became Englands worst defeat at the hands of a colonial force. Join modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, to discover their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: The Universe

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iraagis ja Suurias on meelega havitatud tuhandeid iidseid esemeid ja reliikviaid. Tiibeti kiltmaal ja Kesk-Aafrika džunglites on sustemaatiliselt havitatud puhakirju. Kas see kõik võib toimuda etteplaanitult?

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: ISIS rahastas oma mõrvarlikku režiimi, ruustades maad ja muues saaki enampakkujaile. Kuid kas edasimuujad, oksjonimajad, muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid tunnistavad, et nad rahastasid otseselt mõrvu ja veresauna?

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: See sari jalgib merevaigukutte, kes seda "Laanemere kulda" jahivad. Nad luusivad oositi tormisel rannikul ja tatsavad paeval mudas. Nad on kõikjal, kus seda 40 miljoni aasta vanust juveeli leidub.

With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: See sari jalgib merevaigukutte, kes seda "Laanemere kulda" jahivad. Nad luusivad oositi tormisel rannikul ja tatsavad paeval mudas. Nad on kõikjal, kus seda 40 miljoni aasta vanust juveeli leidub.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Greatest discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iraagis ja Suurias on meelega havitatud tuhandeid iidseid esemeid ja reliikviaid. Tiibeti kiltmaal ja Kesk-Aafrika džunglites on sustemaatiliselt havitatud puhakirju. Kas see kõik võib toimuda etteplaanitult?

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: ISIS rahastas oma mõrvarlikku režiimi, ruustades maad ja muues saaki enampakkujaile. Kuid kas edasimuujad, oksjonimajad, muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid tunnistavad, et nad rahastasid otseselt mõrvu ja veresauna?

programme.title: The Universe

Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Kuidas sunnivad katastroofid
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel are here because of Engineering. But what happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics, and dramatic "moment of disaster" footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Live From the Florida Theater
programme.desc: Earlier this year Lynyrd Skynyrd performed their first two studio albums, "Pronounced Lĕh-nerd Skin-nerd" and "Second Helping", live in their entirety for the first time, at two specially staged concerts at the Florida Theatre in their home town of Jacksonville, Florida. It was a special occasion for both the act and their fans as the band performed tracks theyd never or rarely played live before alongside classic songs that are an essential part of any Lynyrd Skynyrd live show. These unique concerts are a must have for any Lynyrd Skynyrd fan.

programme.title: a-ha - Unplugged
programme.desc: The first a-ha MTV Unplugged Concert ever. The album "MTV Unplugged – Summer Solstice" is being released including a very special LIVE experience.Share the impressive unplugged concert with a-ha in front of astonishing scenery on the picturesque island of Giske, located on the Norwegian coastline.Experience the concert including some hit singles like "Take On Me", "The Sun Always Shines On TV", and "The Living Daylights" as well as two new Songs.

programme.title: 2CELLOS - Live in London
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys
programme.sub-title: Pet Shop Boys: Live at Roskilde 2009
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: Motorhead - Rock Im Park
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Motorhead

programme.title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken
programme.sub-title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken: Live in Chicago
programme.desc: John Mellencamps career in music, spanning more than 42 years, has seen him transition from pop star to one of the most highly regarded songwriters of a generation. Filmed at the landmark Chicago Theatre, just 250 miles away from his upbringing in Indiana, this cinematic concert documentary film captures John Mellencamp reflecting on his career accompanied by self-narration from his highly personal audio diary on his Midwestern upbringing, career and outlook on life as a whole. Meant to be more than just your run of the mill concert film, this intimate performance with full band will fully envelop the viewer into the Mellencamp mindset. "My vision was true, and my heart was too. And there was no end to what I could dream. Life is short, even in its longest days."

programme.title: Tom Petty and The Heartbreakers - Live at Soundstage
programme.desc: Filmed live from the Vic Theatre, Chicago, Illinois, USA in April 2003 for the "Soundstage" TV series.

programme.title: Kiss - Live in Nurburgring
programme.desc: Kiss is one of the legendary groups in Hard Rock history. They have millions of fans around the world and over 100 million records sold. KISS confirms why they have been the best on the scene for nearly four decades, in a performance that made history, impressing an audience of more than 85,000 people, in a show of more than 2 hours and packed with hits, held at the Nurburgring, Germany in 2010.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: Classic Albums: Elton John - Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
programme.desc: This episode of the CLASSIC ALBUMS series uses interviews with Sir Elton and his songwriting partner Bernie Taupin, archival footage of the demo sessions, and rare live performances to tell the story behind the canonical album.

programme.title: Lenny Kravitz - Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Lenny Kravitz has been consolidated as one of the stars that has been in force for a long time, this has led him to appear all over the world and be part of the most popular festivals in the world. This is how on September 26, 2014 he was invited to participate in one of the UKs most popular festivals, the iTunes Festival, giving his audience a great concert at the Roundhouse of London.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons _ Live At The Moody Theater
programme.desc: Filmed at The Moody Theater, Texas, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Imagine Dragons featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Demons, "Radioactive" and many more….

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Gwen Stefani - This is What the Truth Feels Like Tour
programme.desc: This is What The Truth Feels Like is a Gwen Stefani tour made to publicize her album, with the same name. The tour was done in the United States and Canada in 2016.

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: The Black Keys _ Live at Main Square Festival
programme.desc: Main Square Festival is a music festival that takes place in Arras, France, lasting three days.

programme.title: R.E.M.
programme.desc: Filmed at Arena Civica, Milan, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic R.E.M. featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Losing My Religion, Drive, "Man On the Moon" and many more.

programme.title: lovelytheband _ Live at Baeble HQ
programme.desc: Formed in West Hollywood in 2016, lovelytheband features former Oh Honey member Mitchy Collins along with guitarist Jordan Greenwald and drummer Sam Price. The band debuted in July 2017 with the Christian Medice-produced "Broken," a sprightly and infectious single that quickly racked up over three million digital streams. Signing with Another Century Records, lovelytheband released their debut EP "Everything I Could" in September of that year and joined Vance Joy and AWOLNATION on tour. In April 2018, "Broken" was still going strong and hit number one on the Billboard Alternative Songs Airplay chart. That August, lovelytheband returned with their full-length debut album, Finding It Hard to Smile. Once again produced by longtime collaborator Christian Medice, the album included "Broken" as well as the single "These Are My Friends." Enjoy their show in Los Angeles!

programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani - This is What the Truth Feels Like Tour
programme.desc: This is What The Truth Feels Like is a Gwen Stefani tour made to publicize her album, with the same name. The tour was done in the United States and Canada in 2016.

programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: The Moody Blues - Days of Future Passed Live
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of their landmark album, Days of Future Passed, The Moody Blues took to the road to perform the entire LP live. This film, capturing an electric evening at The Sony Centre, Toronto, where the band was joined on stage by a full orchestra for the first time ever, is the definitive performance of this seminal album. This spectacle of a show features stunning visuals and a unique narration performed by Jeremy Irons, transporting the audience and viewer to the psychedelic dream world of their classic record. Including the iconic hits Nights In White Satin and Tuesday Afternoon, this film truly pays homage to five decades of musical mastery. In this impressive yet intimate auditorium, The Moody Blues have never sounded better.

programme.title: Interpol - Rock En Seine
programme.desc: Interpol is an American rock band from Manhattan, New York,[2] formed in 1997. Their original line-up consisted of Paul Banks, Daniel Kessler, Carlos Dengler and Greg Drudy.

programme.title: Ellie Goulding - Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Do not just be fascinated by the beauty and girlishness of this bright-eyed Englishwoman. Ellie Goulding has a lot more to offer fans of good pop music and its electronic variations. Since releasing her first album in 2010, Ellie has traveled the world to showcase her talents, both in the voice and in the composition of her songs. These talents can be seen in this show at the iTunes Festival in London, with special mention for the songs "Burn", "Halcyon", "Lights" and "My Blood".

programme.title: John Denver - Rocky Mountain High
programme.sub-title: John Denver - Rocky Mountain High: Live In Japan
programme.desc: Arguably one of the most beloved American performers of the 20th century, John Denver had a career that saw him sell over 40 million albums worldwide while winning numerous awards, including 2 Grammy Awards, 3 AMAs, 1 Emmy and 2 CMAs. "Rocky Mountain High: Live In Japan" is a 1981 concert from his 7-show tour of Japan and features a wonderful selection of hits from his career, including 4 of his 5 #1 hits: "Annies Song", "Calypso", "Sunshine On My Shoulders" and "Thank God Im A Country Boy".

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: In a career of four turbulent decades of excesses and highs, Aerosmith became the biggest selling American rock band of all time. The "Bad Boys" came together in 1970 in Boston, Massachusetts. Aerosmiths third release, "Toys in the Attic" made them international stars. Lead single,"Sweet Emotion" became their first top 40 hit. In 1987 Aerosmith released their biggest selling album in over a decade, Permanent Vacation. The "Nine Lives" tour was troubled, but in 1998 Aerosmiths fortunes would change once again. Released as part of the soundtrack to the film, Armageddon, I Dont Want to Miss a Thing would become the biggest single of their career. In 2012 Aerosmith released the single, Legendary Child. It had been eight years since they had produced new material but along with the track came the album, Music from another Dimension. Featuring archive material, music videos - "I DONT WANNA MISS A THING" "JANIES GOT A GUN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6).

programme.title: Gwen Stefani - This is What the Truth Feels Like Tour
programme.desc: This is What The Truth Feels Like is a Gwen Stefani tour made to publicize her album, with the same name. The tour was done in the United States and Canada in 2016.

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: Deep Purple - Live in Verona
programme.desc: Filmed in the spectacular surroundings of the Arena di Verona, a Roman amphitheater originally built in 30 AD, this concert from the summer of 2011 sees Deep Purple joined on stage by a full symphony orchestra for performances of all their classic tracks. Deep Purple remains one of the finest hard rock bands on the planet and are undoubtedly at their best when performing live. Here, the orchestral arrangements give an added depth and range to the familiar songs. The band responds to both playing with the orchestra and performing in such a historical location to deliver a brilliant show in front of a huge and enthusiastic crowd.

programme.title: Bastille - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of annual music festivals that take place in Reading and Leeds, England. The events both happen on the bank holiday weekend in August (on Friday, Saturday, Sunday), and share the same bill (occasionally with one or two exceptions). The festivals origins date to the Beaulieu Jazz Festival (1956-1961) which became the National Jazz Festival in 1961 (The National Jazz and Blues Festival in 1963) and settled in Reading in 1971. In 1999 a second leg was added at Leeds. Featuring : Bastille.

programme.title: Limp Bizkit - Live at Reading Festival
programme.desc: The Reading Festival are a pair of annual rock music festivals that take place in Reading and Leeds in England. The events take place simultaneously on the Friday, Saturday and Sunday of the August bank holiday weekend, sharing the same bill.

programme.title: Slash and Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators - Live At the Roxy
programme.desc: On September 25th 2014, shortly after the release of their "World On Fire" album, Slash with Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators took the stage at the legendary Roxy Theatre on Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The atmospheric venue, steeped in rock history, gave fans a brilliant opportunity to experience the band up close as they delivered a set packed with more recent solo tracks, including several from the new album, and classics from Slashs earlier career with Guns n Roses and Velvet Revolver. The intimate setting inspired the band to deliver a scintillating, dynamic performance that is brilliantly captured on this digital release.

programme.title: Green Day - Live at Fox Theater
programme.desc: Live concert of legendary punk-rock band Green Day on April 14, 2009, performing the whole of their imminent new album, "21st Century Breakdown", at the Fox Theater in the bands hometown, Oakland, California.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Billy Talent - Live At Festival Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring Billy Talent.

programme.title: Paul Simon - Live in New York City
programme.desc: During the first leg of Paul Simons triumphant, 2011 U.S. tour, he thrilled hometown fans with a special club performance at New York Citys historic Webster Hall. The show presents this iconic artist working at the peak of his artistic and creative powers in an unusually intimate setting. The 20-song, 90-minute set list was drawn from his legendary career and includes several songs that havent been performed live in many years. "Kodachrome," "Mother and Child Reunion," "Gone At Last" and "The Obvious Child" are just some of the highlights as well as songs from Simons most recent album, 2011s So Beautiful or So What (Hear Music/Concord Music Group) including "Dazzling Blue," "Rewrite," "The Afterlife" and the albums propulsive title track.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Predator at Large
programme.sub-title: Hes Gonna Do It To Your Daughter
programme.desc: Not just found in the wild, natural world, predators can be human too, stalking out their prey in a sinister and disturbing manner. This documentary explores stories from across the United States, where evil killers lurk in the shadows, waiting for the opportune moment to strike. With testimonies from friends, family, and loved ones of victims, law enforcement officers who worked on the cases, and the people closest to the perpetrators, the series reveals chilling tales of horrific, terrifying murders. These sadistic predators are the stuff of nightmares, using the darkness as their cover to commit brutal crimes.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Following Roo Powell, a 38-year-old child advocate, and her team at non-profit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) as they conduct an undercover operation to identify and stop adult predators who use the internet to harm the most vulnerable. With the help of her team, Roo transforms into a teen to reveal the identities of the men who reach out to her.

programme.title: Juhtumit uurib Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: Juhtumit uurib Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: The Night That Didnt End
programme.desc: Family and friends of a murdered victim never forget. The painful memories, visions and hopes for what could have been remain etched in their memory. For law enforcement officials, these memories and details can provide valuable clues that help detectives trace their final steps and identify possible culprits. With images from the crime scenes at the time of the investigations and told through relatives, friends and the officers that pursued the cases, this documentary series examines chilling murders from across the USA.

programme.title: Bad Henry
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of 1990s Charlotte, a city divided by racial tensions, raging gang violence and drug crime, this documentary series reveals the story of an even more sinister atrocity, that of the serial killer Henry Louis Wallace. When the body of Brandi Henderson is found strangled in her Charlotte home, police recognize that it is the second such murder in three weeks and that they have a serial killer on their hands. With a pattern emerging across the city of young African American women being raped and strangled to death, this show tells how detective Garry McFadden, the only African American on the homicide squad at the time, and his dedicated team at the Charlotte-Mecklenburg police department tracked and caught this ruthless killer.

programme.desc: In 2010, Greg Fleniken was found murdered in a Texas hotel. The case runs cold until a Long Island PI uncovers a chilling conspiracy that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Does Murder Sleep?

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A mum and her 10-year-old son are shot dead in their home. A note at the scene tells one story, but the truth may be something entirely different.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: When a young mum disappears, theres no shortage of men in town for police to question. And, a seven-month-old baby is taken from his crib.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Evil Talks
programme.sub-title: The Vanishing Women Of San Luis Obispo
programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Caught In the Net
programme.desc: When 12-year-old Aynis Vargas dies in a seemingly random attack, investigators piece together clues from social media, cell phone data and surveillance footage.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: The story follows forensic expert Alina Burroughs as she utilizes her scientific expertise to uncover the darkest murder mysteries from across the country. Throughout the six-episode programme, Burroughs will investigate some truly baffling cases ranging from a deadly fall from a balcony to the tragic death of a young college student that was believed to be closed.

programme.title: How (Not) to Get Rid of a Body
programme.desc: Las Vegas Detectives must solve the murder of a young woman after her body turns up in a concrete and wooden box in the middle of the desert.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: House of Horrors
programme.desc: Documentary series that tells the terrifying stories of people who were kidnapped and lived to tell their stories. Each episode reveals their awful experience from the moment of the abduction to the hours, days or months of captivity, right to the escape and recovery. Some of the cases that series tackles is abduction of the 13-year old Alicia Kozakiewicz by Scott Tyree, who had approached her in an internet chat room, the case of Marc Schiller, who was ambushed by thugs in broad daylight, the case of Teka Adams, pregnant woman who was abducted by Veronica Deramous, who had claimed to be a caseworker, case of Karen Kummerer, who was captured by her ex-boyfriend and taken on a terrifying, multi-state road trip in her own car, and many other dreadful stories.

We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: How (Not) to Get Rid of a Body
programme.desc: Las Vegas Detectives must solve the murder of a young woman after her body turns up in a concrete and wooden box in the middle of the desert.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Caught In the Net
programme.desc: When 12-year-old Aynis Vargas dies in a seemingly random attack, investigators piece together clues from social media, cell phone data and surveillance footage.

programme.title: Evil Talks
programme.sub-title: The Vanishing Women Of San Luis Obispo
programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.
