programme.title: Teistsugune maailm. Taimor Kunnberg
programme.desc: Автор программы Таймор Куннберг ведёт беседу с интересными людьми о действии Бога в их жизни.

programme.title: See on uleloomulik
programme.desc: Teleevangelist Sid Roth on messiaanlik juut, kes kohtus Jeesus Naatsaretlasega uleloomulikul viisil 1972. aastal. Jutusaade keskendub kristluse uleloomulikele kogemustele. Igas saates intervjueeritakse kristlasi, kes on kogenud imesid ja kel on vaga isiklikke kohtumisi Jumalaga.

programme.title: Karjasekirjad
programme.desc: Valguse Tee Vabakoguduse pastor Mart Metsala seletab koos pastor Veikko Võsuga lahti Jeesuse Kristuse jargimise põhialuseid ja kummutab eri muute. Meediagrupi Valguse Tee Vabakogudus ja Eesti Kristliku TV omavahelisel koostool valminud saatesari praktilisest kristlusest.

programme.title: Klubi 700
programme.desc: Saatesari, mis kajastab kristliku maailma uudiseid ja põnevaid ning julgustavaid lugusid inimeste eludest ule terve maailma.

programme.title: John McLaughlin, The 4th Dimension _ A to Jazz
programme.desc: Every year since 1982, the days around Ascension Day have been devoted to the "Jazz sous les Pommiers" festival in French Normandy. This 10-day festival in Coustances showcases a beautiful variety of local musicians, art performances, and renowned jazz names. "Jazz sous les Pommiers" was founded by two local amateur musicians, teacher Thierry Giard and cultural animator Gerard Houssin. Todays "Jazz sous les Pommiers" concert shows us one of fusions most virtuosic guitar soloists: John McLaughlin. McLaughlin placed his blazing speed in the service of a searching spiritual passion that has kept his music evolving and open to new influences. Whether shredding on electric or simmering quietly on acoustic, McLaughlins intensity and underappreciated versatility have nearly always kept his playing vital, and his best moments - whether as a solo artist or band member -represent some of fusions greatest recordings.

programme.title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen
programme.sub-title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen: Scriabin - Prometheus
programme.desc: San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen (conductor) Jean-Yves Thibaudet (piano) Mathilde Laurent (perfumer) Alexander Scriabin 1872 - 1915 Prometheus, The Poem of Fire Alexander Scriabins symphonic poem "Prometheus, The Poem of Fire" celebrates synesthesia and cosmic unity. Devised by San Francisco Symphony Music Director Esa-Pekka Salonen, pianist Jean-Yves Thibaudet, and Cartier in-house perfumer Mathilde Laurent, the San Francisco Symphony and Cartier present a multisensory production of Prometheus. This collaborative world premiere combines dynamic musical and light performance with olfactory curation, subsuming audiences in Scriabins creative vision more than a century after the piece of total art was composed. Directed by Sebastien Glas San Francisco, Davies Symphony Hall, 3 mars 2024

programme.desc: Every year since 1982, the days around Ascension Day have been devoted to the "Jazz sous les Pommiers" festival in French Normandy. This 10-day festival in Coustances showcases a beautiful variety of local musicians, art performances, and renowned jazz names. "Jazz sous les Pommiers" was founded by two local amateur musicians, teacher Thierry Giard and cultural animator Gerard Houssin. Todays "Jazz sous les Pommiers" concert shows us one of fusions most virtuosic guitar soloists: John McLaughlin. McLaughlin placed his blazing speed in the service of a searching spiritual passion that has kept his music evolving and open to new influences. programme.title: McCoy Tyner Trio live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. McCoy Tyners first main exposure came with Benny Golson, being the first pianist in Golsons and Art Farmers Jazztet. Hes also known for his work with the John Coltrane Quartet. Tyners style is easily comparable to Coltranes maximalist style of saxophone. Though a member of Coltranes group, he was never overshadowed by the saxophonist, but complemented and even inspired Coltranes open-minded approach. McCoy Tyner is considered one of the most influential jazz pianists of the 20th century, an honour he earned both with Coltrane and in his years of performing following Coltranes death.

programme.title: Barenboim on Beethoven
programme.desc: Directed by Christopher Nupen 1970 was the 200th anniversary of Ludwig van Beethovens birth and, to mark the occasion, Daniel Barenboim and Christopher Nupen collaborated on a thirteen-part series about the man and his music. Close friends at the time, Barenboim as artist and Nupen as filmmaker, were on the cusp of long and illustrious careers in music. Much of the material they shot has never been broadcast and, until recently, the footage had lain dormant for half a century. Now the series has been resurrected in its original form. It was recorded when Daniel Barenboim was in his late twenties, full of talent, charisma and early authority. During the episodes, he talks and plays extracts at the piano, illustrating the defining characteristics of Beethovens compositions and sharing his personal insight into the composers mindset. Throughout, he addresses the camera directly as presenter, adding to the intensity of the narrative. For orchestral pieces, he conducts the New Philharmonia Orchestra or plays at the piano with Sir Adrian Boult taking the conductors baton. "Barenboim On Beethoven" is a musical journey charting Beethovens progression in the context of his contemporaries such as Mozart and Haydn. Over twenty key compositions are performed and dissected, making this a unique body of work.

programme.title: Simon Rattle and the Berliner Philharmoniker
programme.sub-title: Simon Rattle and the Berliner Philharmoniker: Symphony No.6 by Mahler
programme.desc: On November 14, 1987, a promising conductor made his Berlin Philharmonic debut with Gustav Mahlers Symphony No. 6: Simon Rattle. In retrospect Rattle says, "I felt that I was finding my voice on that day." Mahlers multifaceted work is now again on the program when Sir Simon appears for the last time as chief conductor of the Berliner Philharmoniker in the Philharmonie in 2018. The wheel comes full circle. Mahlers Symphony No. 6 is often referred to by the nickname Tragische ("Tragic"). Mahler composed work during a happy time in his life, as he had married his wife Alma in 1902 and became father of his second daughter. This contrasts with the tragic and even nihilistic last movement of the symphony.

programme.title: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau
programme.desc: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau: Last Words The great German baritone Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau was greatly admired for his interpretive insight, note-perfect control of the tonal qualities, and shadings of color in his voice, for exceptional rhythmic sense and impeccable diction. His reputation as a lieder singer is so high - he had a repertoire of more than 3.000 songs - that it is easy to forget his extensive list of operatic roles. In this conversation Fischer-Dieskau reveals for the last time on camera the secrets of his outstanding career. His "Last Words" provide a deep insight into the extraordinary artistic life of one of the most famous and prolific lieder singers of our time. Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau died in May 2012 at the age of 86. Directed by Bruno Monsaingeon 2013

programme.title: Die groSSen Musikrivalen
programme.desc: Rivalry in Music - Callas vs. Tebaldi Maria Callas and Renata Tebaldi were the two most famous sopranos of the second half of the last century. Turned into hostile enemies by their admirers, the two became untouchable goddesses of opera. For their fans, Callas was known as "the tigress", Tebaldi as "the voice of an angel": the two singers could hardly have been more different, whether in their professional or private lives. To this day, Callas remains perhaps the greatest soprano of all time. Her rival, Tebaldi, is best known to opera lovers. Why is the posthumous fame of the two prima donnas so different? Directed by Andreas Morell 2020

programme.title: Barenboim on Beethoven
programme.desc: Directed by Christopher Nupen 1970 was the 200th anniversary of Ludwig van Beethovens birth and, to mark the occasion, Daniel Barenboim and Christopher Nupen collaborated on a thirteen-part series about the man and his music. Close friends at the time, Barenboim as artist and Nupen as filmmaker, were on the cusp of long and illustrious careers in music. Much of the material they shot has never been broadcast and, until recently, the footage had lain dormant for half a century. Now the series has been resurrected in its original form. It was recorded when Daniel Barenboim was in his late twenties, full of talent, charisma and early authority. During the episodes, he talks and plays extracts at the piano, illustrating the defining characteristics of Beethovens compositions and sharing his personal insight into the composers mindset. Throughout, he addresses the camera directly as presenter, adding to the intensity of the narrative. For orchestral pieces, he conducts the New Philharmonia Orchestra or plays at the piano with Sir Adrian Boult taking the conductors baton. "Barenboim On Beethoven" is a musical journey charting Beethovens progression in the context of his contemporaries such as Mozart and Haydn. Over twenty key compositions are performed and dissected, making this a unique body of work.

programme.title: Madeleine Peyroux au Grand-Theâtre de Bordeaux
programme.desc: Born in the United States, Madeleine Peyroux is a jazz singer and guitarist with an unclassifiable style and an exceptional artistic personality, carried by a voice that is both soft and husky, with blues and folk accents. After spending part of her childhood in the United States, she moved to France as a teenager where she joined her first jazz bands. An atypical artist, she performs a lot in the street while participating in festivals and creating her own albums. In 2004, she had an international success with Careless Love. Other albums have been released since, including the recent Anthem (2018), the title of which is taken from a Leonard Cohen song.

programme.title: The Surreal Life
programme.sub-title: Villa of Secrets: Sloans Secret Guest
programme.desc: Cameras roll as a group of fading celebrities move into a Hollywood Hills mansion together for two weeks, documenting their interaction with one another, as well as their daily lives and participation efforts in various group activities.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: MTV Floribama Shore
programme.desc: Meet eight young and beautiful people - Jeremiah Buoni, Nilsa Prowant, Gus Smyrnios, Kortni Gilson, Codi Butts, Aimee Hall, Kirk Medas and Candace Rice, who relocate to Panama City Beach, the hottest beach town on the Gulf Coast for the summer. There, they all live together and have outrageous antics, spending their time drinking, partying, working, mingling and bonding with each other, in this reality series that is a successor to the well-known Jersey Shore.

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.sub-title: What Are We Gonna Do About Him?
programme.desc: The Teen Moms are thrown into a new world of parenting adolescents while juggling their own relationships and making shocking personal discoveries. Mackenzie McKee returns as a series regular and Jenelle Evans makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: The Teen Moms are thrown into a new world of parenting adolescents while juggling their own relationships and making shocking personal discoveries. Mackenzie McKee returns as a series regular and Jenelle Evans makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.sub-title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act. With the help of a relationship expert and a private investigator, Tami will uncover the shocking truths and get the receipts to expose the cheats. Once the investigation is complete, the suspicious lover can choose to team up with their partners other lover or take them both down in an undercover ambush. In a life-altering confrontation, Tamis tough love approach will help the heartbroken find the answers they need to make the ultimate decision - move forward together or end their relationship for good. Will Tamis exposure bring these lovers closure?

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Joe and Phi have been dating for one year. Phi is a hard-working single mother of four and Joe is desperate to be a part of her family. Joe is a self-proclaimed reformed ladies man, but Phi is hesitant. Has he really left his playin days behind?

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.sub-title: Ex problems, house problems, mum problems

programme.title: MTV Floribama Shore
programme.desc: Meet eight young and beautiful people - Jeremiah Buoni, Nilsa Prowant, Gus Smyrnios, Kortni Gilson, Codi Butts, Aimee Hall, Kirk Medas and Candace Rice, who relocate to Panama City Beach, the hottest beach town on the Gulf Coast for the summer. programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.sub-title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Johnny slipped into Ariels DMs over a year ago and now theyre engaged! Ariel plays stepmother to Johnnys son, but Johnny wont let her meet the mother of his child and is hiding her from virtually every aspect of his life!

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.desc: This thirty-fifth season of the MTV reality competition series The Challenge sees members The Real World, Are You the One?, Big Brother, Celebrity Big Brother UK, The Amazing Race, Survivor, Geordie Shore, Ex on the Beach, Shipwrecked and Survival of the Fittest go head-to-head in a bid to secure the 1 million dollar prize. The competitors participate in daily challenges and can be nominated to take part in the elimination round where they battle against another adversary to avoid being sent home. The remaining combatants endure a harrowing final challenge which pushes them to the limits of their strength and determination.

programme.desc: Meet eight young and beautiful people - Jeremiah Buoni, Nilsa Prowant, Gus Smyrnios, Kortni Gilson, Codi Butts, Aimee Hall, Kirk Medas and Candace Rice, who relocate to Panama City Beach, the hottest beach town on the Gulf Coast for the summer. There, they all live together and have outrageous antics, spending their time drinking, partying, working, mingling and bonding with each other, in this reality series that is a successor to the well-known Jersey Shore.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Heartland Docs, DVM
programme.desc: Down in the Ducks. Dr. Erin treats a golden retriever with a mysterious illness and removes a massive tumor from a senior pug. Meanwhile, Dr. Ben treats a family duck that has been feeling sad since it lost his mate.

programme.title: Heartland Docs, DVM
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest predators in the animal kingdom owe their success to the fact that they dont kill alone. Worlds Deadliest: Packs and Swarms takes a deep dive into the world of group predation with a look at twelve different species that use teamwork to hunt more effectively than they otherwise would be able to alone.

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to southern Vietnams tropical habitats, home to gibbons and playful macaques, green sea turtles, and Asian black bears.

programme.title: Wild Arctic
programme.desc: From a polar bear struggling to hunt on dwindling sea ice, to an ice-proof caterpillar that take more than a decade to pupate, the Arctic Islands are a proving ground that pushes all its animals to the max.

programme.title: Wild Arctic
programme.desc: The Frozen Forest. Home to a trillion trees, the boreal forest encircles the entire globe. Bears, wolves, and hummingbirds emerge, hoping to take part in a feeding frenzy, in the largest forest on earth.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Australia, a continent unto itself…home to scores of creatures found nowhere else in the world. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the Great Barrier Reef to the Outback, to the urban jungle, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand these animals, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Australias Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to southern Vietnams tropical habitats, home to gibbons and playful macaques, green sea turtles, and Asian black bears.

programme.title: Wild Arctic
programme.desc: From a polar bear struggling to hunt on dwindling sea ice, to an ice-proof caterpillar that take more than a decade to pupate, the Arctic Islands are a proving ground that pushes all its animals to the max.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols rush to prepare for their farms first Michigan winter. The family goes into hyperdrive to fix the pasture fence and finish building the garden hardscape before the first snow falls. Beth is worried about the bees, so she brings in some expert help to hopefully ensure their survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its winter on the farm, and the Pols are adding to their flock! The family is bringing in four merino ewes that were recently bred, which means with any luck the farm could be expecting its first lambs come springtime. And as winter fades into spring, the Pols prepare for the new arrivals by building a lambing pen. Meanwhile, Beth checks if her bees survived the winter.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. One of the main driving forces in animal behaviour is the desire to procreate and ensure the continuity of the species and this is evident in the battles that males participate in for the right to mate with females. However, parenting skills can vary enormously with some animals being prepared to give up their own lives for their offspring while others are revealed to pose the greatest threat. The show also examines how the animals impact on the landscape by building paths and constructing homes.

programme.title: Vanishing Kings
programme.sub-title: Vanishing Kings: Desert Lions of Namib

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. programme.title: Vanishing Kings

programme.title: Lion Brothers
programme.desc: With his brothers help, Mtima faces the trials of life and learns the true meaning of leadership to become the king he always dreamed hed be.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.title: Soul of the Cat
programme.desc: This film will look at the behaviors between domestic cats and their wild cousins and ancestors, specifically to draw those parallels and to explain to "owners" what they are seeing when they watch their cat.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: From tree-climbing leopards to skull-crushing Jaguars, from fast-swimming fishing cats to quick-digging sand cats - watch the killer strategies that make wild cats possibly the deadliest family on the planet.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. One of the main driving forces in animal behaviour is the desire to procreate and ensure the continuity of the species and this is evident in the battles that males participate in for the right to mate with females. However, parenting skills can vary enormously with some animals being prepared to give up their own lives for their offspring while others are revealed to pose the greatest threat. The show also examines how the animals impact on the landscape by building paths and constructing homes.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Eternal Enemies
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Malika the Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, the story of Malika is one of hardship, loneliness, and determination. She must battle her uncles to establish a territory of her own where she can start a family.

programme.sub-title: Vanishing Kings: Desert Lions of Namib

programme.title: Lion Brothers
programme.desc: With his brothers help, Mtima faces the trials of life and learns the true meaning of leadership to become the king he always dreamed hed be.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in New Mexico
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Journey across Africa exploring the continents most iconic and deadliest predators. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: When Predators Attack
programme.desc: This docuseries detais what happens when predators come face to face with their prey and humans and reveals the reasons why dangerous encounters take place and the best way for people to avoid them or to make a quick escape if necessary. Each one hour long episode focuses on a specifice animal including formidable killer snakes that use deadly venom or constriction to defeat their opponent; black bears, grizzlies, and giant polar bears who are increasingly encroaching into human territory because of climate change and are confronting more humans; and the most ancient of predators, the crocodile.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest predators in the animal kingdom owe their success to the fact that they dont kill alone. Worlds Deadliest: Packs and Swarms takes a deep dive into the world of group predation with a look at twelve different species that use teamwork to hunt more effectively than they otherwise would be able to alone.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Among animals, battles are often a zero-sum game. In just about every struggle, theres a winner and a loser, and the stakes are often life or death. The motives for combat are varied, but they usually boil down to this: food, territory, and sex. Worlds Deadliest: Battles looks at the epic struggles that ensue when predators seek to make a meal out of their prey…

programme.title: Petra
programme.desc: Jordaania kõrbe sudames asuv iidne Petra linn kubiseb saladustest. Kuidas jõuti sellise arhitektuurini rohkem kui 2000 aastat tagasi?

programme.title: Angkori Kadunud Aarded
programme.desc: Arheoloogide rahvusvaheline tiim uurib hindamatut iidset aaret, mis leiti Kagu-Aasias Laoses. Nende missioon viib neid džunglisse templite juurde. Kõrgelt õhust otsitakse uusi valjakaevamiskohti, kus tehakse vapustavaid avastusi, kui uuritakse tsivilisatsiooni, mis ehitas võimsa Angkori linna.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Arvame, et teame, milline oli Hitleri plaan maailmas võimule paasemiseks. Leidub aga uks raakimata lugu sellest, kuidas natsid maailma ookeanides salajast sõda pidasid. Allveearheoloogid asuvad otsima Hitleri saladusi, mis on peidetud vete sugavustesse. Teise maailmasõja kadunud vrakkide uurimiseks kuivendatakse teaduslike andmete ja arvutigraafika abil ookeane.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Äarmuslikus põhjakaares, metsikul ekspluateerimata rikkuste maal, kus ida kohtub laanega, paljastatakse Alaska legendaarse kummituslaeva otsingu kaigus Ameerika Ühendriikide piirkond, mida kunagi Vene Ameerika nime all tunti. Nuud, 150 aastat hiljem, viivad uued juhtlõngad traagilisele Ameerika Ühendriikide laevastiku surnuaiale, mida peeti igavesti kadunuks.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Kõigest paar minutit enne maandumist kukub China Airlinesi lend 140 Jaapani Nagoya lennujaamas alla. Hommikuks on uurijad kohal ja uurivad hoovõturajal soestunud rususid. Leiud vaid suurendavad mõistatust. Esialgu paistab, et katastroofis on suudi piloodid, aga parast kurnavat kahe aastast uurimist on selge, et õnnetuse põhjused on palju keerulisemad.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Iga lennuõnnetus palvib kogu maailma tahelepanu ja eksperdid, kelle ulesanne on õnnetuse põhjused kindlaks teha, asuvad toole. Saade paljastab kõige legendaarsemate lennuõnnetuste tagamaad ning igas osas naidatakse tunnistajate utlusi, paeluvaid taaslavastusi, uusimat arvutigraafikat ja intervjuusid uurijatega, kes teevad selgeks, mis laks valesti.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: China Airlinesi lend 676 laheneb aina tugevnevas elektritormis Taipeile ning kukub alla rahvarohkele maanteele. Pardal hukkub 196 inimest ja maa peal kuus ning see on suurim lennukatastroof riigi ajaloos. Kõige võti on 11 arusaamatut sekundit, kui kumbki piloot ei võtnud juhtimist ule.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: "Lollid ja teadus", 7. hooaeg. Dallas Campbell juhib saadet, mis uhendab tõsise teaduse televaatajate salvestatud hullumeelsete ja vaatemanguliste klippidega. Selles osas uurime teaduslikult ebaõnnestumisi seoses taispuhutavate lumerõngastega huppamisega ja ATV-ga labi vee sõitmisega ning mis juhtub, kui loomad seisavad silmitsi treppidega.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: "Kuivendatud ookean" lahendab maailma uhe suurima musteeriumi - Loch Nessi koletise isiku. Võrdlused Maa sugavaima jarvega - Vene Siberis asuva Baikali jarvega - koos militaartasemel skaneerimistehnoloogia ja ule kogu jarve pinna tõmmatud sonarikardinaga - Šotimaa kuulsa jarve alt tõmmatakse kork ara. Vee ara voolamisel ilmub peale koletise lagedale palju muudki.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Mehhiko lahe kuivendamine toob paevavalgele surmavad saladused, mis tõestavad, et Põhja-Ameerika ajalugu - kaubandus, orjapidamine, sõjad, naftatoostus ja isegi dinosauruste hukk - on võimalik mõista vaid vete sugavustesse vaadates.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Arheoloogid uurivad Oregoni rannikul ule kolmesaja aasta tagasi uppunud laeva jaanuseid. Põlisameeriklaste suulised parimused raagivad laevahukust ja selles ellujaanutest. Vesi uhub laevalt parit portselani ja mesilasvaha ikka veel kaldale. Arheoloogid rekonstrueerivad uppunud laevavraki oma ettekujutuse põhjal, kasutades ajaloolisi andmeid ja enda teadmisi, ning naitavad, kuidas see hiiglaslik laev vedas sadu tonne kaupa pooleldi umber maailma.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Keset aikesetorme ja vihmavalinguid asub Martinairi lend 495 lõpplahenemisele Portugali Faro lennujaamale. Kuid vaid hetked enne maandumist laheb midagi valesti ja DC-10 prantsatab vastu lennurada, puruneb ja libiseb lennurajalt maha. Uskumatul kombel jaavad enamik reisijaid ja meeskond ellu. Kuid kui uurijad asuvad vrakist saadud tõendusmaterjale analuusima, muutub juhtunu veelgi mustilisemaks.

programme.title: Ellujaamine Teises maailmasõjas
programme.desc: Hazen Audel rassib labi Tai bambusdžungli, kajastades kumne vangi põgenemist jõhkrast teise maailmasõja aegsest Tai-Birma "Surma" raudtee aares olevast Jaapani toolaagrist.

programme.title: Ellujaamine Teises maailmasõjas
programme.desc: Ellujaamisasjatundja Hazen Audel trotsib Euroopa suurimat tasandikku, et kaia Norra komandode ekstreemse põgenemiskatse jalgedes, kes nurjasid Hitleri aatomipommi loomise plaani.

programme.title: Apokalupsis
programme.desc: 1924. aastal kirjutas Adolf Hitler: "Riik, kes vabaneb rassilisest saastast, peab iseenesest mõistetavalt juhtima maailma." Kuidas õnnestus Hitleril Saksamaa vallutamine? Miski ei ennusta selle keskparase uliõpilase ja apardunud kunstniku tõusu Fuureriks - Saksamaa diktaatoriks.

programme.title: Apokalupsis
programme.desc: 1929. aasta. Üleilmsest majanduskriisist rangalt rasitud Saksamaa langeb masendusse. Natside ja kommunistide vahelised verised tanavalahingud saavad sisse hoo. Hirm "punase hadaohu" ees, lukkab miljonid haaletajad Hitleri sulle. Demokraatia on hadaohus ja seda paastmas pole kedagi. 1933. aastal nimetatakse Hitler kantsleriks.

programme.title: Hitleri tapjaist teismelised
programme.desc: Nad kasvasid ules natside võimu all ja lubasid Hitleri eest anda oma elu. Nad olid fanaatikud, kes ei kohkunud millegi ees - nad olid 20 000 teismelist, kes moodustasid 12. SS-Soomusdiviisi. Nad saadeti Prantsusmaale, et peatada liitlaste pealetung, kus nad kulvasid oma teel hirmu ja havingut. Ajaloolised varviliselt taastatud kaadrid ja kaputais ellujaajaid raagivad meile selle loo.

programme.title: Saladuslikud saared
programme.desc: A headless skeleton is discovered on Australias Beacon Island. Near the Marshall Islands in the Pacific Ocean, a huge undersea crater is explored. In Mexico, an investigation into an eerie island full of dolls reveals grim history. Strange animal bones are found in a grave on an island in the English Channel.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Hetk parast Washingtoni Rahvuslikult lennuvaljalt õhku tõusmist kukub Air Florida lend 90 jaatunud Potomaci jõkke ja vajub labi jaa.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui kahe Boeing 737 MAX 8 lennukiga juhtub vaid viie kuu jooksul surmaga lõppenud õnnetus, on kogu MAX 8 lennukipark sõidust kõrvaldatud, kuni uurijad paljastavad mõlema õnnetuse põhjuse.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Keset aikesetorme ja vihmavalinguid asub Martinairi lend 495 lõpplahenemisele Portugali Faro lennujaamale. Kuid vaid hetked enne maandumist laheb midagi valesti ja DC-10 prantsatab vastu lennurada, puruneb ja libiseb lennurajalt maha. Uskumatul kombel jaavad enamik reisijaid ja meeskond ellu. Kuid kui uurijad asuvad vrakist saadud tõendusmaterjale analuusima, muutub juhtunu veelgi mustilisemaks.

programme.title: Hitler
programme.desc: Selles episoodis uuritakse, kuidas Adolf Hitleri populaarsus alguse sai.

programme.title: Hitler
programme.desc: Selles episoodis vaadeldakse Adolf Hitleri tõusu Saksamaa kantsleriks ja fuureriks.

programme.title: Hitler
programme.desc: Selles episoodis uuritakse, kuidas Hitler muutis Saksamaa diktatuuriks ja laiendas Reichi.

programme.title: Saladuslikud saared
programme.desc: A headless skeleton is discovered on Australias Beacon Island. Near the Marshall Islands in the Pacific Ocean, a huge undersea crater is explored. In Mexico, an investigation into an eerie island full of dolls reveals grim history. Strange animal bones are found in a grave on an island in the English Channel.

programme.title: Saladuslikud saared
programme.desc: Uuritakse Venemaa huljatud sõjavaebaasi kulma sõja paevilt. Colombia ranniku lahedal leitakse saarelt lagunev kuninglik palee. Jaapani Yonaguni saare juurest avastatakse mere põhjast kivistruktuur. Itaalias leitakse Stromboli vulkaanisaarelt tõendeid sealse keeruka ajaloo kohta.

programme.title: Suur jarvistu
programme.desc: Tormiline Suur jarvistu on tais vrakke, mis on kadunud veesugavustesse ja unustuste hõlma. Saates paljastatakse uute teadmiste abil viimase aastakumne jooksul põnevaimad avastused Suure jarvistu põhjast ning see, kuidas need teadmised võimaldavad uurida ja pinnale tuua hiljuti avastatud vrakke, sealhulgas salaparast laevastikku, mida ei ole nahtud alates 1914. aastast.

programme.title: Kerose varjatud saladused
programme.desc: Egeuse mere sudames korraldatakse uurimisretk. Arheoloogide ruhm avastab võib-olla et maailma vanima veealuse varjupaiga.

programme.title: Saladuslikud saared
programme.desc: Uuritakse Venemaa huljatud sõjavaebaasi kulma sõja paevilt. Colombia ranniku lahedal leitakse saarelt lagunev kuninglik palee. Jaapani Yonaguni saare juurest avastatakse mere põhjast kivistruktuur. Itaalias leitakse Stromboli vulkaanisaarelt tõendeid sealse keeruka ajaloo kohta.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: HSI agendid uurivad JFK lennujaamas kahtlast pagasikaitlejat ning paljastavad rahvusvahelise kriminaalse ruhmituse, mis kasutab Ameerikasse kokaiini vedamiseks lennujaama tootajaid. Tanu uuele infole toimuvad kogu riigis vahistamised ja kauba konfiskeerimine, uks ka JFK terminali lahedal. MIA tolli- ja piirivalveteenistus kahtlustab, et reisija on peitnud kokaiini oma kingadesse, ning Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas võetakse vahele võltsitud esemete laadung, mille vaartus on hinnanguliselt 500 000 dollarit.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: MIA tolli- ja piirivalveteenistus võtab sihikule reisija, kes kaib tihti Colombias, ning teda kusitledes tekib kahtlus, et mees võib narkootikume smugeldada. Ametnikud otsivad narkolasti ja uritavad pusida kartellist sammuke eespool. HSI agendid viivad JFK lennujaama postiruumist leitud ecstasy Wall Streetile ning Los Angelese rahvusvahelises lennujaamas kusitletakse kaht reisijat nende kulastuse teemal. Üht neist kummitab siiani kunagine narkotarbimine.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Tavareisil Berliinist teel olev Crossairi lend 3597 laheneb Zurichile. See on uks paeva viimaseid planeeritud maandumisi. Aga mõni minut enne maandumist ei suuda piloodid enam lennurada leida.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui kahe Boeing 737 MAX 8 lennukiga juhtub vaid viie kuu jooksul surmaga lõppenud õnnetus, on kogu MAX 8 lennukipark sõidust kõrvaldatud, kuni uurijad paljastavad mõlema õnnetuse põhjuse.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Keset aikesetorme ja vihmavalinguid asub Martinairi lend 495 lõpplahenemisele Portugali Faro lennujaamale. Kuid vaid hetked enne maandumist laheb midagi valesti ja DC-10 prantsatab vastu lennurada, puruneb ja libiseb lennurajalt maha. Uskumatul kombel jaavad enamik reisijaid ja meeskond ellu. Kuid kui uurijad asuvad vrakist saadud tõendusmaterjale analuusima, muutub juhtunu veelgi mustilisemaks.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: "Lollid ja teadus", 7. hooaeg. Dallas Campbell juhib saadet, mis uhendab tõsise teaduse televaatajate salvestatud hullumeelsete ja vaatemanguliste klippidega. Selles osas uurime teaduslikult ebaõnnestunud katseid ATV-ga 360 kraadist pooret teha, jõekarestikel sõita ja võimlemispalliga treenida.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: "Lollid ja teadus", 7. hooaeg. Dallas Campbell juhib saadet, mis uhendab tõsise teaduse televaatajate salvestatud hullumeelsete ja vaatemanguliste klippidega. Selles kosmoseteemalises osas soostame kosmosesse ja uurime kulgetõmbejõude, ulekoormust, elamiskõlblikke piirkondi ja kokkupõrkeid.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: On avastatud palju uusi tõendeid tsivilisatsioonidest, mis on nuudseks sajandeid merepõhjas olnud, alates salaparastest veealustest puramiididest Jaapani rannikul ning lõpetades legendaarse Atlantisega. Kas tegemist on tõeliste antiiksete paikadega või pelgalt geoloogiliste juhustega? Kasutame tipptasemel arvutigraafikat ning raagime maailma juhtivate merearheoloogidega, et avastada, mis merepõhjas tegelikult toimub.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Michigani jarve kuivendamine toob paevavalgele Chicago varjatud ajaloo. Uusima sonartehnikaga paljastame 300 inimese surmaga lõppenud katastroofi, lahendame traagilise jõulumõistatuse, uurime Teisest maailmasõjast parit murdelist merevae treeningprogrammi ja avastame inseneriteaduse ime, mis takistab maailma kõige kiiremini kasvava linna elanikke surnuks lambumast. Chicago hammastava loo keskmes on ambitsioonikus ja risk, ainult et vahel lõpeb see katastroofiga.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: Kaks vesilennukit, mille pardal on turistid, põrkavad Alaska vapustava kose kohal kokku. Üks puruneb kokkupõrkel, teine kukub peaaegu tervena vette. Ellujaanud piloot tunnistab, et kokkupõrge juhtus ilma igasuguse hoiatuseta. Vrakist selgub kiiresti, kuidas lennukid kokku põrkasid, aga põhjuse selgitamiseks tuleb kasutada 3D-tehnoloogiat.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 4. novembril 2010, vahetult parast Singapuri Changi lennujaamast õhkutõusmist, tekkis Qantase lennul 32 mootoririke, mis kahjustas tõsiselt lennukit. Meeskond veetis õhus kaks pingelist tundi enne edukat hadamaandumist, mis paastis kõik pardal viibijad. Selles episoodis jagab kapten Richard de Crespigny oma ulevaadet sellest, kuidas ta kangelaslikult toime tuli sellega, mis oleks võinud olla kindel katastroof.

programme.title: Katastroofi Lahkamine
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. Why did Fukushimas nuclear plant meltdown and explode after a massive earthquake? How did a 200ft tall tower crane collapse onto the Manhattan streets? Why did the USS Forrestal, Americas flagship aircraft carrier, explode killing 134 crew?

programme.title: Katastroofi Lahkamine
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Deepwater Horizon explode causing the worst manmade oil spill in history? Why did the Air France Concorde crash barely a minute after take off? How did so many people die in an Austrian funicular trip up the inside of a mountain at Kaprun?

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Valk on tabanud saabuvat rahvusvahelist lendu. Insenerid hindavad kahjustusi, kuid reisijad muutuvad uha karsitumaks. Kõva tuul toob kaasa lennuradade sulgemise, mis muudab lennuplaanid pingeliseks. Saabub veel uks lennuk, mille lastist lekib potentsiaalselt ohtlik vedelik. Kolm maapealse meeskonna liiget, kes sellega kokku puutusid, pannakse karantiini, kuni tuletõrjujad saavad vedeliku tuvastada.

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Kuna Sydney lennujaam tootab murapiirangute tõttu vaid ajavahemikus 06.00-23.00, on seal pinge peal, et korraldada paevas 900 lennuki liikumist. Toodejuhataja George seisab silmitsi kahtlase pakiga ja algajal Melil on tunni aja jooksul akitselt kaks meditsiinilist hadaolukorda. Lisaks on kaubakaitlusmeeskonnal probleem pungil tais kaubakabiini laadimisega.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Vaga suur osa meie majandusest toetub kaubaveole. Terve maailma toostusharud sõltuvad tootlikkuse suurendamiseks kaubalennukitest, avamerelaevadest ja elektrirongidest. Asjatundjad uurivad, kuidas kolossaalseid kaubamasinaid kavandatakse vedama tohututes kogustes kaupa kiiresti ja tõhusalt.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 12. augustil 1985 pidi Japan Airlines 123 viima 524 reisijat Tokyost Osakasse. Vaid 12 minutit parast lennu algust tekkis aga Boeingis 747 saatuslik dekompressioon, mis rebis ara suurema osa sabaosast. Kuna hudraulika oli taielikult kadunud, ei suutnud meeskond lennukit juhtida. Kogenud piloodid puuavad lennusimulaatorite abil valtida lennuõnnetust, milles hukkus 520 inimest.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 2018. aasta oktoobris juhtus esimene saatuslik 737 MAX lennutragoodia, milles hukkusid kõik pardal olnud 189 inimest. Lion Airi lend 610 oli õhus vaid 13 minutit, enne kui kaotas kontrolli ja kukkus merre. Varsti parast seda, 2019. aasta martsis, kukkus 6 minutit parast õhkutõusu alla teine Etioopiast valjuv 737 MAX, tappes kõik inimesed pardal. Uurijad jagavad, kuidas neid tragoodiaid oleks saanud ara hoida.

programme.title: Taasloodud lennuõnnetused
programme.desc: 17. jaanuaril 2008 lahenes British Airwaysi lend 38 Londoni Heathrow lennujaamale, kui see vahetult enne lennurada alla kukkus. Pekingist (Hiina) saabunud rahulik reisilend muutus peaaegu saatuslikuks, kui mõlema mootori võimsuse puudumise tagajarjel kukkus Boeing 777 alla. Meeskonna ja kapten Peter Burkilli kiire mõtlemine hoidis ara surmaga lõppeva õnnetuse ja paastis kõik 152 inimest pardal.

programme.title: Superautode tuunimine
programme.desc: Kogenud mehhaanikud Shane ja Dan pistavad rinda senistest keerukama ulesandega. Neil tuleb Audi RB muuta Gymkhana Gridi võistlusautoks.

programme.title: Superautode tuunimine
programme.desc: Shane Lunch ja Dan Baruffo saavad elu võimaluse. DeLorean Motor Company omanik soovib, et nad teeksid paris uue auto.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Tuumaenergia on vaatamata vastuolulisele mainele tehnoloogia arengule uskumatul viisil vagagi kasulik. Kriminalistika- ja kosmosemissioonisusteemide insenerid selgitavad, kuidas tuumaenergia toidab raadioisotoopseid generaatoreid ja nendega seotud susteeme, mis on olulised karmides tingimustes toimuvate kosmoselaevade, satelliitide, kosmosesondide ja mehitamata kaugoperatsioonide jaoks.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: Vaga suur osa meie majandusest toetub kaubaveole. Terve maailma toostusharud sõltuvad tootlikkuse suurendamiseks kaubalennukitest, avamerelaevadest ja elektrirongidest. Asjatundjad uurivad, kuidas kolossaalseid kaubamasinaid kavandatakse vedama tohututes kogustes kaupa kiiresti ja tõhusalt.

programme.title: Suursugused masinad
programme.desc: In this programme, we examine the science behind some of the worlds most impressive, technologically advanced machines. What big ideas drove their evolution? How do they actually work? What sets each machine apart? Follow along for all the fascinating stories as we reveal the best-kept mechanical secrets that not only made these extraordinary machines work, but also changed the world in a big way.

programme.title: Megaprojektid
programme.desc: Vaatleme Real Madridi kuulsa staadioni, meeskonna fannide tõelise templi Santiago Bernabeu tipptasemel renoveerimistoid. Igavale betoonehitisele futuristliku metallfassaadi, sissetõmmatava katuse, 360º-videotabloo ja revolutsioonilise maa-aluse valjakususteemi paigaldamine ajal, kui seal toimuvad ka mangud, uletab inseneriteaduse piirid.

programme.title: Sydney lennujaama telgitagused
programme.desc: Valk on tabanud saabuvat rahvusvahelist lendu. Insenerid hindavad kahjustusi, kuid reisijad muutuvad uha karsitumaks. Kõva tuul toob kaasa lennuradade sulgemise, mis muudab lennuplaanid pingeliseks. Saabub veel uks lennuk, mille lastist lekib potentsiaalselt ohtlik vedelik. programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: JFK lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud peatavad Trinidadist saabunud reisija, kelle pagasis on konservid troopiliste puuviljadega. Konservid sisaldavad puuviljade asemel aga valget pulbrit. Tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud leiavad Miami postikeskusest pudelikesed kahtlase vedelikuga. Selgub, et tegemist on GBL-iga, ohtliku ainega, mida vagistajad kasutavad oma ohvri uimastamiseks. Smugeldaja tabamiseks toimetatakse saadetis HSI jarelevalve all saajateni. Los Angelese rahvusvahelise lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud kuulavad ule naissoost reisijaid, kes võivad olla seksikaubanduse ja abielupettuse ohvrid.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: JFK lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud otsivad labi Panamast Hong Kongi sõitva reisija, kel pole tood ega raha. Ametnikud kahtlustavad, et ta smugeldab narkootikume labi Ameerika Ühendriikide. Miami rahvusvahelise lennujaama tolli- ja piirivalveametnikud leiavad Argentiinasse suunduva postisaadetise hulgast ebaseaduslikke relvaosi, mis kaivitab rahvusvahelise uurimise. HSI suundub nuud Buenos Airesisse, et aidata kohalikel ametivõimudel korraldada kahtlustatavatele relvakaubitsejatele uleriigiline haarang. Operatsiooni "Patagoonia ekspress" kaigus arestitakse suurim relvalaadung Argentiina ajaloos.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Eelmise sajandi jooksul kerkis esile uus ookeanihiiglane. Merearheoloogid ja ajaloolased otsivad labi aegade merre vajunud suurimaid laevavrakke. Uued teaduslikud andmed uhendatakse ookeanide tuhjendamiseks tipptasemel arvutigraafikaga, et uurida maailma kõige hammastavamaid vrakke.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: Kui korallikeegli mang laheb uime alt valja, siis Beebi peab õppima, kuida oma sisemist haijõudu kontrollida. Bentley Barracuda ahvardab Soola linnavaljakult valja tõsta ja Beebi uritab oma haalt maksma panna.

programme.title: Beebi hai suur sõu
programme.desc: Beebi hai uritab Williamile parimat uime-sõpruse paeva korraldada. Kui Vola rula enne suurt uritust kaob, siis detektiiv Beebi hai ja William Watson on juhtumi kallal.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.desc: Paddington laheb uutele seiklustele. Naiteks mereaarde puhkusele ja kulla tuleb ka eriline kulaline Peruust.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.sub-title: Paddington leiab tuvi / Paddington ja koduste toode nimekiri
programme.desc: Paddington ravib haiget lindu kelle nimi on Tuvikene, aga kas ta saab temast lahti oelda? Perekonnas on kõikidel kodused tood peale Paddingtoni. Et mitte valja jaada loob hr. Brown nimekirja, mida Paddington peab jalgima, aga Paddington võtab vale nimekirja.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.desc: Kutsade pritsimispargi plaanid on ohus ja nad peavad loomingulised olema, et elanikke suvel jahutada. Kutsad tootavad Lucase ja Lily ullatus-mangutoa kallal, kuid neid kulastab orav, kes põhjustab ehitusel raskuseid.

programme.title: Rubble ja meeskond
programme.desc: Rubble kolib ehituskutsade perega Ehituslahe linna, kus nad elavad, mangivad ja ehitavad kõike, mida kogukond vajab.

programme.title: Hirvemeeskond
programme.desc: Steel ja Hirvemeeskond tahab professor Scratchile ullatus-sunnipaevapidu korraldada, aga kaksikud võivad peo rikkuda. Suure talendisõu võitmiseks paluvad Stu ja Safia professoril Dinorobotit programmeerida, et ta taidaks laste kaske.

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.desc: Paddingtonil on raske leida pargi erilise pildiseina jaoks kangelast. Äkki ta peab kangelast kodust otsima. Paddingtonist saab tanu Mateole ja erilisele maskile kangelaslik rulataja, aga kas mask on ikka maagiline?

programme.title: Paddingtoni seiklused
programme.desc: Taylor paljastab, et tal on sunnipaev, aga kuidas ta sõbrad selle eriliseks teevad, kui nad ei teadnud? On Burnsi õhtu ja pr Bird raagib Paddingtonile haruldasest loomast nimega metsik Haggis, aga kas see kulastab neid?

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad
programme.desc: Leek ja AJ lahevad oma suurimas rallis eales Lomastaja vastu, et võistelda umber Maa, et võida Maailma suurim karikas!

programme.title: Blaze ja monstrum-masinad

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik _ Kapapatrull

programme.desc: On võidusõidupaev ja kutsad asuvad uksteise vastu võistlema, et saada teada, kes on kiireim. Hr Porter võtab osa koogivõistlusest ja vajab selleks Ryderi ja kutsade abi. Aeg jookseb, et kook õigeks ajaks valmis saada ja võistlusele viia.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik _ Kapapatrull

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Its time to restock the secret Krabby Patty ingredient, and it is SpongeBobs duty to make sure the ingredient is delivered safely to the Krusty Krab. // Plankton has a customer who eats at the Chum Bucket every day.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang takes Katara and Sokka back to a favorite place he used to go to when he was younger, the Earth Kingdom City of Omashu. But when they break the law they are taken to the King to get their punishment. The eccentric King of Omashu puts Aang through a series of challenges and if he fails Katara and Sokka will be engulfed in a crystal cocoon

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: When the group arrives at a small Earth Kingdom mining town, they see an earthbender, named Haru, who is practicing his ability, but he runs away when Katara tries to confront him about it. They soon learn that the Fire Nation has taken over the town, that earthbending is forbidden and all earthbenders are taken away to an offshore prison. However, when an elderly man is trapped in a collapsed mine, Katara urges Haru to use his powers to save the mans life, but then, the old man reports Haru to the authorities. Katara blames herself for his predicament and she vows to rescue him, but will she succeed?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: When Aang is assigned to help defend a town from a monster that has been plaguing the town, his lack of ability and knowledge becomes obvious, as he doesnt know what to do. However, when Sokka tries to rush to Aangs rescue during the fight, he himself becomes captured and is taken away by the monster, which turns out to be from the spirit world. Aang promises Katara that hell find Sokka and bring him back, but with Aang even doubting himself, will he be capable of finding where the monster went?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.sub-title: Nuts to You / The Terror of Madagascar
programme.desc: Nuts to You/The Terror of Madagascar Description : Nuts to You: Fred the Squirrel has hit the jackpot. He stumbles onto a jackpot oak tree which is loaded with acorns (thats tons of money to animal folk). Hes going to need financial advice, and who better to offer sound advice than King Julien? The two enter a partnership looking for ways to spend on the good life. The Red Squirrel has designs on the loot, though, and captures the hapless twosome in order to squeeze the acorns out of them. Will the evil squirrels precisely planned plot pay or get him played? The Terror of Madagascar: A special delivery has come from Madagascar. What is it? A baby Fossa! Everyone is enchanted by the little tyke except King Julien, who sees him as a lemur-devouring predator, and he has the toothmarks on his butt to prove it! Julien formulates a plan to get rid of the adorable little carnivore, but his slithery solution becomes much worse than the problem!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains: Its a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Juliens determined to taste them too. He sneaks into the gorilla habitat while they sleep, and he and Marlene end up eating a few too many for the gorillas not to notice. Like all of them. When they realize what theyve done they head for the hills as fast as their stolen car can take them. Can the penguins calm the savage beasts before they bash the banana bandits? P.E.L.T.: Skippers losing it. His performance on the obstacle course is actually slowing down, so he has to trigger a special fitness test to prove he can still lead the squad. Kowalski takes over as Skipper excuses himself to go on his fitness quest. The brainy bird appears to do a bang-up job in the leadership role - are Skippers days at the helm over but hes too chicken to admit it?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang learns that he must go to the Fire Nation temple during the winter solstice if he wishes to speak with Avatar Roku to see what he must do. However, with Prince Zuko on his trail while he heads straight into the heart of the nation who wants him captured, he realizes that this isnt going to be an easy task. Will Aang be able to talk to Avatar Roku before Zuko finds him?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: After Katara attempts to teach Aang waterbending, she is desperate to improve her abilities. When Katara inadvertently stumbles across a waterbending scroll that can help improve her ability while Aang is looking at a pirates store, she decides to steal it after she realizes that she couldnt hope to afford it; but will she be capable of stealing from the pirates without causing herself and her friends trouble?

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: While traveling towards the North Pole, the group almost gets captured by the Fire Nation. However, when a charismatic young man and his band of rebels attack the Fire Nations camp and rescue them, the gang learns that the rebels are trying to resist the Fire Nations motives to expand their territory. Katara and Aang really enjoy their time with the band of rebels, but Sokka soon discovers that they arent as noble as meets the eye

programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee: The Space Agency intends to send one of the chimps to the moon. In the opinion of certain flightless waterfowl, this important mission would be much better served by sending a flightless waterfowl instead. Private proves to be best suited for the trip (believe it or not) and with the help of a clever monkey suit disguise, he ends up on the moon.

programme.desc: Lincoln saab endale abiõpetaja, kes kohe kõikidele tema õdedele meeldima hakkab ning Lincoln ei suuda seetõttu õppida. Lapsed kurdavad pere maja ule, aga kui tornaado seda havitada ahvardab, muudavad nad meelt.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kalmer uritab Kasna-Kallest eemale paaseda ja sõidab paadiga nii kiiresti minema kui võimalik. Ta peetakse kinni ning ta peab uuesti paadisõidukooli minema.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: When Aang and friends come to the rim of a giant canyon, they are asked to help guide two groups of refugees across. Aang quickly learns that this will be no easy task - the two tribes have been fighting for 100 years, not to mention the vicious wildlife living on the canyon floor.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Aang, Katara and Sokka have run out of money. Katara suggests Sokka get a job, and coincidentally, they meet a fisherman who is looking for someone to help him out with his fishing. But when the fisherman recognizes Aang as the Avatar, he blames Aangs absence for all of the troubles of the last 100 years, and Aang runs away on his glider. Katara follows on Appa, and when she finds him, Aang begins to reveal life before he was frozen in the iceberg. Meanwhile, Prince Zuko and Lieutenant Jee get into a fight, but Iroh breaks it up. Soon thereafter, the Lieutenant and the rest of the crew gain a newfound respect for their leader after learning of his past

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured. Meanwhile, Zhao has been promoted to Admiral and he is using the Fire Nations best men to capture Aang, and he eventually succeeds. All hope seems lost for Aang and his friends, but there may just be a glimmer of hope when a strange blue spirit masked figure comes to Aangs rescue, but who could it possibly be?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out its to free her brother Francis who happens to be a "mind-jacked" Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.sub-title: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck
programme.desc: Ricos beloved doll, Miss Perky, has a new line of princess accessories! Joy! But in order for Skipper to reward the loco penguin with the new swag he must fill a marble jar (one marble in for good behavior, one marble out for bad.) How in the world is Rico supposed to behave and fill the jar when King Julien has kidnapped his dolly with the intention of marrying her?

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.desc: On valimispaev ja Parim kandideerib Raamatuklubi presidendiks oma hea sõbra Rocky vastu. Parem ja Parim panevad kogemata allveelaeva kulalismajana kirja ja nad saavad kulalise, kellele nad peavad muljet avaldama.

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.desc: On valimispaev ja Parim kandideerib Raamatuklubi presidendiks oma hea sõbra Rocky vastu. Parem ja Parim panevad kogemata allveelaeva kulalismajana kirja ja nad saavad kulalise, kellele nad peavad muljet avaldama.

programme.title: Parem ja Parim
programme.desc: Parem lõhub viimase puhta taldriku ja nõude pesemise asemel lahevad Parem ja Parim uut taldrikut ostma. Parem ja Parim otsustavad teha parima piimakokteili eales, aga nad satuvad Flip Flopiga suurde võistlusele.

programme.title: Teismeliste ninjakilpkonnade tõus
programme.desc: Rise up! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and this time theyve got awesome new powers! Join Raph, Leo, Donnie and Mikey as they master new weapons, battle absurd mutants, and discover a Hidden City beneath New York. Cowabunga!

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
programme.desc: Dog Dish:Dudleys forced to wear an amplified sound neck cone to keep from scratching his butt. When he finally stops sulking, our fearless canine hero discovers an ingenious way to use the cone to his advantage to save Kitty from an invisible Snaptraps horde of dangerous villains. Watch Dog:Using a time travel watch, Dudley tries to go back to the past to outwit Kitty for the last doughnut left in the T.U.F.F. snack room...or know every answer in second grade. However, Dudley somehow accidentally alters the course of time and creates a world in which the malevolent Snaptrap rules and everyone at the agency works for him it is up to Dudley to save Petropolus.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: On paadisõidukooli aastaraamatu pildistamise paev. // Kui Patrick oma kaaluga võrdse koguse krabiburgereid soob ja ei maksa, paneb hr Krabi ta restoranis toole. // Kasna-Kalle vanemad on kadunud.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle saab teada, et "imiteerimine on meelituse kõige ehedam vorm" - kahjuks ei oelnud keegi talle kuidas seda jarele jatta. // Kasna-Kalle aukudesse kolivad elama ussid ja ta peab oma uusi rõvedaid sõpru teiste eest varjama.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Merimees ja Nuivahkpoiss avaldavad Kasna-Kallele ja Patrickule oma salajase ja kangelasliku paritolu. // Plankton kasvatab endale Kasna-Kalle DNA-d kasutades teise silma ja muutub heaks.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Koolipeo eelõhtul palub Hr Krabi, et Kasna-Kalle aitaks Parli naolt nuivahi eemaldada. // Kasna-Kalle laheb vanaema sunnipaevale ja palub Patrickul Gary jarele valvata.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.sub-title: Terve elu uhes paevas / Paikesest pleegitatud
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle valvab Sandy maja ja kõik on vaikne ja rahulik, kuni Patrick valja ilmub. // Kasna-Kalle ja Kalmer kaotavad oma piletid ja uritavad meeleheitlikult valjamuudud Kelpy G kontserdil lava taha paaseda.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Hr Krabi kasutab krabiburgeri peal Sandy eksperimentaalset kasvusegu ja tulemused on katastroofilised. Bubble Buddy poeg Shiny on kulas ja Kasna-Kalle uritab teda meeleheitlikult probleemidest ja teravatest nurkadest eemale hoida.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Hr Krabi kasutab krabiburgeri peal Sandy eksperimentaalset kasvusegu ja tulemused on katastroofilised. // Bubble Buddy poeg Shiny on kulas ja Kasna-Kalle uritab teda meeleheitlikult probleemidest ja teravatest nurkadest eemale hoida.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.sub-title: Krabiburger, mis Bikiini Põhja ara sõi / Mullisemu tagasitulek
programme.desc: Kalmeril on Kasna-Kalle tuututest veiderdustest kullalt ja ta laseb valjastada lahenemiskeelu. // Plankton arvab, et ta varastas Krõbedast Krabist krabiburgeri, kuid tegelikult varastas ta hoopis kuulsa kunstniku teose.

programme.title: Kasna-Kalle Kantpuks
programme.desc: Kasna-Kalle laheb vanaema sunnipaevale ja palub Patrickul Gary jarele valvata.

programme.title: Kivi, Paber, Kaarid
programme.desc: Et Rotivendade peole minna peab trio saama uue laheda eseme ehk pogopulgad.

programme.title: Nachrichten
programme.desc: ntv informiert uber die aktuellen Top-Themen des Tages, zeigt die wichtigsten Entwicklungen auf der ganzen Welt, liefert Hintergrunde und Einschatzungen und fasst zusammen, was die Menschen bewegt. Immer wieder sind Experten und Politiker im Studio oder zugeschaltet, die die Nachrichtenlage kommentieren und einordnen.

programme.title: Teleborse
programme.desc: Die "Teleborse" prasentiert die wichtigsten Wirtschafts- und Finanznachrichten des Tages, ordnet sie fur die Zuschauer ein und liefert Erklarungen. Zu Wort kommen dabei sowohl Verbraucher als auch relevante Experten - vom Startup-Up-Grunder bis zum Vorstandschef. Die aktuellsten Entwicklungen an den Finanzmarkten veranschaulichen Reporter an den Borsen in Frankfurt und New York.

programme.title: Aufstieg der Autokraten - Die globale Gier nach Macht
programme.desc: Im Jahr 2023 fuhrte das Stockholmer Institute for Democracy and Electoral Assistance (IDEA) eine Studie durch, die zu dem Schluss kam, dass die Demokratie weltweit seit sechs Jahren auf dem Ruckzug ist - die langste Zeitspanne seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen im Jahr 1975. Diese Entwicklung betrifft mehr als die Halfte der Lander der Welt, wobei Lander wie Belarus, Russland, die Turkei und Indien einen drastischen Ruckgang der demokratischen Freiheit verzeichnen. Heute erleben wir denselben Grad an Erosion in Landern, die einst als demokratische Saulen galten, darunter Italien, Ungarn und seit kurzem auch die Vereinigten Staaten. Jungste Berichte uber vorgeschlagene politische MaSSnahmen wie das republikanische Projekt 2025 zeigen einen zunehmend alarmierenden Trend zum Autoritarismus und zur Aufhebung der demokratischen Grundlagen der groSSten Volkswirtschaft der Welt.

programme.title: Spiegel TV
programme.desc: Herr Merz, die Brandmauer und die AfD Selten hat eine Abstimmung im Bundestag fur so viel Kritik gesorgt. In dieser Woche brachte CDU-Chef Merz mit den Stimmen der AfD seine Migrationsantrage durchs Parlament. Alice Weidel und ihre Fraktion lagen sich vor Freude in den Armen. Der mogliche nachste CDU-Bundeskanzler hatte im Vorfeld erklart, was in der Sache richtig sei, werde nicht falsch, wenn die Falschen zustimmen. Wie das Wackeln der Brandmauer fur Oberwasser im AfD-Wahlkampf sorgt. Unterwegs mit der Mochtegern-Kanzlerin Weidel.

programme.title: Chinas geheime Machtspiele - Tauschung, Tricks und Tarnung aus Fernost
programme.desc: Die Verurteilung eines chinesischen Spions in Cincinnati markiert einen wichtigen Schritt im Kampf gegen die Spionageaktivitaten Chinas. Die Verhaftung des Spions fuhrte zur Entdeckung von GUOANBU, einem machtigen chinesischen Geheimdienst, der eine unerbittliche Kriegsfuhrung gegen den Westen fuhrt und dessen Aktivitaten von Paris bis Washington und von Beijing bis Djibouti reichen.

programme.title: Pulverfass Ostasien - Kampf um die Macht im Sudchinesischen Meer
programme.desc: Der asiatisch-pazifische Raum steht heute im Mittelpunkt eines erbitterten Wettstreits zwischen China und den USA als Weltmacht. Der Film erkundet die geopolitischen Vorgange innerhalb dieses neuen Pulverfasses. Wir befinden uns an einem Wendepunkt der Weltgeschichte. Die archaischen Reflexe der Vergangenheit sind noch nicht uberwunden, was also kann beide Seiten dazu bringen, sich selbst zu hinterfragen?

programme.title: Chinas Jahrhundert des Kommunismus
programme.desc: Anlasslich des 100-jahrigen Bestehens der Kommunistischen Partei Chinas im Jahr 2021 wirft diese Sendung einen Blick auf die Schlusselfiguren und Ereignisse, die diese Zeit gepragt haben. Historisches Filmmaterial, Experteninterviews und Zeitzeugenberichte werfen neues Licht auf wichtige Geschehnisse wie den Burgerkrieg, den "GroSSen Sprung nach vorne", die groSSe Hungersnot, die Kulturreform sowie die Reformen von Mao Zedong und Deng Xiaoping.

programme.title: Supermacht China - Kampf um die Welt
programme.desc: Mit massiven Investitionen in der ganzen Welt erreicht China immer mehr sein Ziel, die fuhrende Supermacht der Welt zu werden. China, das von Experten bereits als groSSte Volkswirtschaft des Planeten bezeichnet wird, ist nicht mehr nur ein wichtiger Akteur auf der wirtschaftlichen Weltbuhne sondern hat sich Kampf um die Poleposition bereits entsprechend positioniert. Die Dokumentation untermauert diese Vormachtstellung eindrucksvoll.

programme.title: Aufrustung in der Arktis - Russlands Militaroperationen
programme.desc: Spannungen in der Arktis: Durch den Ruckzug des Eises und somit den Zugang zu wertvollen Ressourcen entsteht ein Wettlauf der Supermachte. Russland hat neue Seewege unter Kontrolle gebracht und zahlreiche Militarbasen errichtet, wahrend China militarische Übungen mit Russland durchfuhrt. Der Westen versucht aufzuholen, wahrend sich die Frontlinien in der Polarregion abzeichnen.

programme.title: Chinas geheime Machtspiele - Tauschung, Tricks und Tarnung aus Fernost
programme.desc: Die Verurteilung eines chinesischen Spions in Cincinnati markiert einen wichtigen Schritt im Kampf gegen die Spionageaktivitaten Chinas. Die Verhaftung des Spions fuhrte zur Entdeckung von GUOANBU, einem machtigen chinesischen Geheimdienst, der eine unerbittliche Kriegsfuhrung gegen den Westen fuhrt und dessen Aktivitaten von Paris bis Washington und von Beijing bis Djibouti reichen.

programme.title: News Spezial
programme.desc: Ein groSSes Thema, das gerade in der ganzen Welt oder in ganz Deutschland fur Furore sorgt, wird in dieser Sendung besonders ausfuhrlich behandelt. Auf der Grundlage genauer und grundlicher Recherchen wird das jeweilige Thema ausfuhrlich dargestellt und die Problematik bis ins Detail erlautert. Interviews und Diskussionen mit Experten runden das Informationsprogramm ab.

programme.title: NFL Aktuell
programme.desc: Das ntv Magazin "NFL Aktuell" widmet sich jeden Dienstag um 19:10 Uhr und 23:20 Uhr den aktuellen Themen und Entwicklungen rund um die NFL. Das Magazin prasentiert die Highlights des vergangenen NFL-Wochenendes, inklusive des Monday-Night Games. Zudem liefern die Moderatoren Alessa-Luisa Naujoks und Marcel Klein alle Ergebnisse, Wissenswertes und Experten-Einschatzungen rund um den Spieltag und nehmen auch die kommende Gameweek ins Visier.

programme.title: News Spezial

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Die Dokumentationsreihe "Furchte Deinen Nachsten!" wirft einen Blick auf die grausamen Taten von Schwerverbrechern, deren Freunde und Familie bis zur Aufklarung der Verbrechen ahnungslos waren. Vater, Eltern, Ehemanner und Geliebte haben sich fur die ihnen nahestehenden Menschen als Monster erwiesen, die ein Doppelleben fuhrten. Auf der einen Seite waren sie treusorgende Angehorige und auf der anderen Seite Rauber, Betruger und Killer...

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Fur Jenn Carson ist ihr Vater die wichtigste Bezugsperson in ihrem Leben. Er war es, der zu Hause blieb, als sie ein Baby war, weil ihre Mutter arbeitete. Doch alles andert sich fur die junge Frau, als sie erkennen muss, dass der Mensch, den sie am meisten liebt, ein Serienkiller ist.

programme.title: Nachrichten
programme.desc: ntv informiert uber die aktuellen Top-Themen des Tages, zeigt die wichtigsten Entwicklungen auf der ganzen Welt, liefert Hintergrunde und Einschatzungen und fasst zusammen, was die Menschen bewegt. Immer wieder sind Experten und Politiker im Studio oder zugeschaltet, die die Nachrichtenlage kommentieren und einordnen.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Sante und ihr Sohn Kenneth Kimes lebten in einer Fantasiewelt, betrogen andere Menschen um ihr Geld und ihren Besitz. Dabei gingen sie uber Leichen, um ihr Treiben zu vertuschen. Sie toteten einen Bankangestellten, einen Freund der Familie und 1998 eine 82-jahrige Frau, deren Identitat Sante Kimes annehmen wollte, um deren Appartementhaus in Manhattan zu verkaufen.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Stephen Seddon wird im Marz 2012 als Held gefeiert, weil er seine Eltern und seinen Neffen aus einem sinkenden Auto rettet, uber das er selbst die Kontrolle verloren hatte und das im Kanal landete. Vier Monate spater sind seine Eltern tot. Scheinbar ein erweiterter Selbstmord seines Vaters. Doch die Spurensicherung findet heraus: der Mann kann sich gar nicht selbst erschossen haben. Der geldgierige Sohn hat seine Eltern wegen des Erbes getotet.

programme.title: Anwalte der Toten - Im Kopf des Morders
programme.desc: Anthony Arkwright totete 1988 zunachst seinen GroSSvater und dessen Haushalterin, bevor er zwei seiner Nachbarn bestialisch ermordete. Auf den ersten stach Arkwright mehr als 500 Mal ein, bevor er dessen Eingeweide herausriss und in allen Raumen der Wohnung verteilte. Sein letztes Opfer war an den Rollstuhl gefesselt. Ihm stach er die Augen aus und stopfte Zigaretten in die leeren Hohlen.
